name: Pong Deluxe (Highway Studios)
description:
This is a relatively simple game where it gives you  the illusion that you are the ball and the camera rotates with the ball. Try to decide which way the ball rotated then align the planets to hit it. So pretty much pong with a twist. 

By the way, I know the music is terrible because I made this game in 2.5 hours so I just decided to mess with your head with it. And also this was made by an eleven year old.
